name: AVCaptionFormatConformer
desc: An object that converts a canonical caption to a specific format.

items.name: init(conversionSettings: [AVCaptionSettingsKey : Any])
items.desc: Creates a new object with format conversion settings.

items.name: var conformsCaptionsToTimeRange: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to conform the time range of a canonical caption.

items.name: func conformedCaption(for: AVCaption) -> AVCaption
items.desc: Creates a caption that conforms to a specific format.
